channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Propaganda Press Keeps Trying To Turn Radical Anti-ICE Agitators Into Victims
item.description: Corporate media outlets have covered the Minneapolis ICE story like they’ve covered much of Homeland Security’s efforts to secure the homeland: dishon...

item.title: Education Remains the Key to Good Citizenship
item.description: No matter whether you’re an immigrant or a native-born American, education instills the love of country that we all ought to have.

item.title: Trump Has A Real Insurrection On His Hands In Minnesota
item.description: What's happening in Minnesota is a real insurrection, far different from the J6 riot, and Trump needs to treat it like one.

item.title: Only Government Force Can Stop Democrats From Plunging America Into Darkness
item.description: Democrats created the situation America finds itself in, and only a forceful crackdown on leftist anarchy will restore cultural stability.

item.title: ‘ICE Watch’ Activists Aren’t ‘Legal Observers,’ They’re Criminal Obstructors
item.description: Those emphasizing Renee Nicole Good’s 'legal observer' status are shamefully trying to blind the American people to these nefarious insurgent machinat...

item.title: Pro-Lifers Still Need to Be Heard in Washington
item.description: The mixed record of the second Trump administration and the GOP Congress on life suggests that pro-lifers still have work to do in Washington.

item.title: It’s Time to Ditch ‘Disparate Impact Theory’ — and Biden’s Weaponization of Civil Rights Law
item.description: HUD has proposed a rule to end the agency’s use of this pernicious legal doctrine.

item.title: Norwegian leader says he received Trump message that reportedly ties Greenland to Nobel Peace Prize

item.title: Anti-ICE activists celebrate the return of Virginia's sanctuary status
item.description: Hours after Virginia Democratic Gov. Abigail Spanberger was sworn in Saturday, she repealed an executive order signed by her Republican predecessor, G...

item.title: Democrats' support for law and order collides with the party's opposition to assisting ICE
item.description: The Trump administration has made an implicit offer to sanctuary jurisdictions: Let ICE into their prisons and jails, and deportation officers won't b...

item.title: Trump links bid to control Greenland to Nobel Peace Prize snub in message to Norway's leader
item.description: President Trump sent a message to Norway's prime minister saying he no longer feels "an obligation to think purely of peace" because he didn't receive...

item.title: Here’s The Good, The Bad, And The Ugly Of The White House Health Plan
item.description: The White House's 'Great Health Care Plan' contains some good policies and some not-so-good ones.

item.title: Joe who? Trump's mission to erase all traces of the Biden presidency
item.description: President Biden used to joke with younger voters that they'll forget all about him once he is out of office. Soon, all of America could be asking, "Jo...

item.title: Let the Pro-Life Movement Declare Independence
item.description: The Republican Party’s leadership has made its choice. Pro-lifers need to make theirs.

item.title: It’s Way Past Time to Retire the International Space Station
item.description: With sky-high costs for minimal returns, the ISS has failed on both the geopolitical and scientific research fronts.
